citrixXenServer.name: Citrix XenServer
citrixXenServer.description: Credentials required for monitoring the Citrix Xen virtualization platform.

properties.name: xen.pool
properties.description: Enable/disable discovery of entire resource pool's VMs

permissions.name: XenServer Administrator
permissions.description: Account must have administrator access to XenServer

citrixXenApp.name: Citrix XenApp
citrixXenApp.description: Credentials required for monitoring Citrix XenApp application virtualization services.

properties.name: Citrix.VAD.SecureHostname
properties.description: The value in the certificate if it is different from the value of system.hostname

permissions.name: XenApp Read-only Administrator
permissions.description: Account must have read-only administrator access to XenApp

dellEMCPowerStore.name: Dell EMC PowerStore
dellEMCPowerStore.description: Credentials required for monitoring Dell EMC PowerStore enterprise storage systems.

properties.name: dell.powerstore.alert.levels
properties.description: Property to customize which alert levels from PowerStore are checked (None, Info, Minor, Major, Critical). Can be configured as single value or multiple values comma separated. Default value is (Major,Critical).

permissions.name: Storage Read-only Account
permissions.description: Account must have read-only access to storage systems

dellEMUnity.name: Dell EMC Unity
dellEMUnity.description: Credentials required for monitoring Dell EMC Unity storage systems and their components.

permissions.name: UniSphere Read-only Account
permissions.description: The Unisphere REST API defines this role as “operator

dellEMCVNX.name: Dell EMC VNX
dellEMCVNX.description: Credentials required for monitoring Dell EMC VNX storage systems and arrays.

permissions.name: Navisphere Read-only Account
permissions.description: The Navisphere REST API defines this role as “operator

dellEMCIsilon.name: Dell EMC Isilon
dellEMCIsilon.description: Credentials required for monitoring Dell EMC Isilon scale-out NAS storage systems.

properties.name: snmp.community
properties.description: SNMP v1/v2c or v3 credentials. See SNMP protocol for common properties

properties.name: system.categories
properties.description: in Isilon clusters we’re not able to automatically discover the master node. In this case you’ll need to add IsilonMaster to that device’s system.categories property.

permissions.name: SNMP Read-only Account
permissions.description: SNMP credentials must have read-only access to storage systems

esxServer.name: ESX Server
esxServer.description: Credentials required for monitoring VMware ESX/ESXi hypervisor servers.

permissions.name: Read-only Role
permissions.description: Account must have read-only role at minimum

vcenterServer.name: vCenter Server
vcenterServer.description: Credentials required for monitoring VMware vCenter management servers.

permissions.name: Read-only Role
permissions.description: Account must have read-only role at minimum

mongodb.name: MongoDB
mongodb.description: Credentials required for monitoring MongoDB NoSQL database instances and clusters.

permissions.name: clusterMonitor
permissions.description: Account must have clusterMonitor role

netapp.name: NetApp
netapp.description: Credentials required for monitoring NetApp storage systems and filers.

properties.name: netapp.user
properties.description: Username for accessing NetApp filers via API

properties.name: netapp.pass
properties.description: Password for accessing NetApp filers via API

permissions.name: API Access
permissions.description: Account must have API read access

paloaltoFirewall.name: Palo Alto Firewall
paloaltoFirewall.description: Credentials required for monitoring Palo Alto Networks next-generation firewalls.

properties.name: paloalto.apikey.pass
properties.description: API key for accessing Palo Alto Networks firewalls

properties.name: snmp.community
properties.description: SNMP v1/v2c or v3 credentials. See SNMP protocol for common properties

permissions.name: API Access
permissions.description: Account must have API read access

f5.name: F5 Big-IP
f5.description: Credentials required for monitoring F5 Networks load balancers. Both nodes and floating IPs should be monitored for complete coverage.

properties.name: snmp.community
properties.description: SNMP v1/v2c or v3 credentials. See SNMP protocol for common properties

properties.name: system.categories
properties.description: The category of the device. F5Active should be added to the system.categories property of the floating IP for the device.

permissions.name: SNMP Read Only
permissions.description: Account must have SNMP read only access

sqlServer.name: SQL Server
sqlServer.description: Credentials required for monitoring Microsoft SQL Server databases. Note: When using Windows authentication, the LogicMonitor collector service account must have appropriate access.

properties.name: jdbc.mssql.user
properties.description: Username for SQL Server if using local SQL Server authentication. Will not work with Windows authentication.

properties.name: jdbc.mssql.pass
properties.description: Password for SQL Server if using local SQL Server authentication. Will not work with Windows authentication.

permissions.name: SQL View/Select Access
permissions.description: Account must have SQL View/Select access to specific databases, see SQL Server documentation for more details on required permissions

ciscoMeraki.name: Cisco Meraki
ciscoMeraki.description: Credentials for Cisco Meraki devices. The SNMP credentials used are configured at the organization level. For best results, use the Scripted Netscan method for onboarding and discovery.

properties.name: meraki.api.key
properties.description: API key for accessing Cisco Meraki devices

properties.name: meraki.api.org
properties.description: Organization ID for accessing Cisco Meraki devices

properties.name: meraki.snmp.community
properties.description: SNMP v1/v2c credentials. For SNMP v3, see documentation for required properties

properties.name: lmaccess.id
properties.description: LM Access ID for checking for device duplicates

properties.name: lmaccess.key
properties.description: LM Access Key for checking for device duplicates

ciscoUcs.name: Cisco UCS
ciscoUcs.description: Credentials for Cisco UCS devices. The UCS manager and all fabric interconnects should be monitored for full coverage.

properties.name: ucs.api.port
properties.description: Port for Cisco UCS Manager API, default is 443

citrixNetscaler.name: Citrix NetScaler
citrixNetscaler.description: Credentials required for monitoring Citrix NetScaler application delivery controllers.

properties.name: snmp.community
properties.description: SNMP v1/v2c or v3 credentials. See SNMP protocol for common properties

properties.name: ssh.user
properties.description: SSH username for Citrix NetScaler. Required for configuration collection.

properties.name: ssh.pass
properties.description: SSH password for Citrix NetScaler. Required for configuration collection.

http.name: HTTP
http.description: Credentials required for monitoring web services and applications via HTTP/HTTPS protocols.

properties.name: http.user
properties.description: Username for web page collection method

properties.name: http.pass
properties.description: Password for web page collection method

permissions.name: HTTP Access
permissions.description: Account must have HTTP access to target URLs

ipmi.name: IPMI
ipmi.description: Credentials required for monitoring hardware sensors and event logs via IPMI protocol.

properties.name: ipmi.user
properties.description: Username to access IPMI sensors and event logs

properties.name: ipmi.pass
properties.description: Password to access IPMI sensors and event logs

permissions.name: IPMI User
permissions.description: Account must have IPMI user privileges

jdbc-mysql.name: MySQL JDBC
jdbc-mysql.description: Credentials required for monitoring MySQL database servers via JDBC connection.

permissions.name: SELECT
permissions.description: Account must have SELECT privileges

jdbc-oracle.name: Oracle JDBC
jdbc-oracle.description: Credentials required for monitoring Oracle database instances via JDBC connection.

permissions.name: SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE
permissions.description: Account must have SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE

snmp-v1v2c.name: SNMP v1/v2c
snmp-v1v2c.description: Credentials required for monitoring devices using SNMP versions 1 and 2c protocols.

permissions.name: SNMP Read
permissions.description: Device must allow SNMP reads from collector IP

snmp-v3.name: SNMP v3
snmp-v3.description: Credentials required for monitoring devices using the secure SNMP version 3 protocol.

permissions.name: SNMP Read
permissions.description: Device must allow SNMP reads from collector IP

ssh.name: SSH
ssh.description: Credentials required for monitoring Linux/Unix systems and collecting network configuration details via secure shell access.

properties.name: ssh.pass
properties.description: SSH password (only if not using key-based auth)

properties.name: ssh.cert
properties.description: Path to SSH private key on Collector host

permissions.name: Shell Access
permissions.description: Account must have shell access

wmi.name: WMI
wmi.description: Credentials required for monitoring Windows systems via Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI).

properties.name: wmi.user
properties.description: Windows username for remote WMI access

properties.name: wmi.pass
properties.description: Windows password for remote WMI access

permissions.name: WMI Access
permissions.description: Account must have WMI query permissions

permissions.name: Remote Registry
permissions.description: Account must have remote registry access
